TMS stands for Transport Management System — it helps you manage contracts, bookings, deliveries, and finances in one platform.
A Transport Management System (TMS) is a software that streamlines logistics operations from start to finish.
WebXpress is a complete TMS solution with contracts, booking, delivery, billing, and finance all integrated.
Our system connects operations directly with finance and ensures GST/E-way compliance automatically.
WebXpress Velocity connects directly to the government system to generate GST and E-way bills automatically.
All your GST and E-way bill requirements are handled seamlessly without extra steps.
You can create bookings, track deliveries, and manage contracts easily in WebXpress.
Our booking system is fully integrated with billing and finance for seamless operations.
WebXpress TMS supports Parcel/LTL/Express, Air Cargo, FTL/Fleet, Container (EXIM), Tanker, and Cold Chain operations.
Our system is versatile and can fit almost any transport business vertical you serve.
A Control Tower is a centralized dashboard that provides real-time visibility into shipments, vehicles, hubs, and deliveries.
The Control Tower helps monitor operations, detect delays, manage exceptions, and improve decision-making in real time.
In logistics, a Control Tower gives end-to-end visibility and control across the entire supply chain.
A Transportation Control Tower is a centralized digital platform that provides real-time visibility of vehicles, trips, and shipments using GPS, IoT, and TMS data.
WebXpress Transportation Control Tower integrates vehicle movement, shipment data, and telematics to predict delays, detect deviations, and improve SLA performance.
The Control Tower combines trip-level and shipment-level intelligence to proactively manage logistics operations and prevent supply chain disruptions.
With WebXpress Control Tower, organizations gain end-to-end visibility, automated alerts, and predictive insights across their transportation network.
